item.title: week of year in python and in postgres
item.description: import datetime today = datetime.date.today() today.isocalendar()[1]SELECT EXTRACT(WEEK FROM TIMESTAMP '2012-12-04 20:38:40');

item.title: x days ago in python
item.description: import datetime today = datetime.date.today() yesterday = today - datetime.timedelta(1) x = 5 x_days_ago = today - datetime.
